title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. F, pt. 201 - Apple Marketing Order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. F, pt. 201 - Apple Marketing Order

State Regulations
§ 201.1 - Definitions
§ 201.2 - Marketing order area
§ 201.3 - Establishment and members of advisory board
§ 201.4 - Nominations for advisory board membership
§ 201.5 - Acceptance and terms of office
§ 201.6 - Duties and responsibilities of the advisory board
§ 201.7 - Advertising, promotion and publicity of apples and apple products
§ 201.8 - Marketing and product research
§ 201.9 - Information services
§ 201.10 - Budget and assessment
§ 201.11 - Collection of assessment
§ 201.12 - Disbursement of funds
§ 201.13 - Termination and periodic referendum
§ 201.14 - Effective date
§ 201.15 to 201.16 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. IV, subch. F, pt. 201

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§16, 18, 214-b, 294

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
